title: Unintentionally cancelled my free 3 month Google One subscription on Pixel 4! How can I get it back?
content:
Hello, I am a new Pixel user (Pixel 4). Earlier today, I logged in to Google One app and as a Pixel user, I got my free 3 month subscription. 
But accidentally (I was just checking the settings) I cancel my subscription. ðŸ˜¢ðŸ˜¢ 
what can I do now? 
Is there any chance I can get back my free subscription?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
